llm_command:
kubectl apply -n frontend -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:

  namespace: frontend
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: adservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 9555
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: currencyservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 7000
EOF
